lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic urged people to think about Brazilians who are having to live with the Zika outbreak on a daily basis rather than worrying about how the situation might affect those traveling to the country for the Rio Olympics in August.
snippet: Novak Djokovic urged people to think about Brazilians who are having to live with the Zika outbreak on a daily basis rather than worrying about how the situation might affect those traveling to the country for the Rio Olympics in August....

headline.main: Djokovic Urges Wider Concern Over Zika
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Urges Wider Concern Over Zika
